languages.text: "Запрос о сотрудничестве рассмотрен и принят. Запрашиваю у технобрата Тарзуса согласия на совместное участие представителей династии фон Валанциус в процедуре расследования".
"Request for cooperation reviewed and accepted. I request Tech-Brother Tarzus's consent to the co-participation of representatives of the von Valancius dynasty in the investigation proceedings."
languages.original_text: "Запрос о сотрудничестве рассмотрен и принят. Запрашиваю у технобрата Тарзуса согласия на совместное участие представителей династии фон Валанциус в процедуре расследования".

traits.locale_text: "Request for cooperation reviewed and accepted. I request Tech-Brother Tarzus's consent to the co-participation of representatives of the von Valancius dynasty in the investigation proceedings."

languages.text: 「協力要請の検討および受諾。技術同胞ターザスのフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の代表者の捜査手順への共同参加に対する同意を要求した」
languages.original_text: "Request for cooperation reviewed and accepted. I request Tech-Brother Tarzus's consent to the co-participation of representatives of the von Valancius dynasty in the investigation proceedings."

traits.locale_text: 「協力要請の検討および受諾。技術同胞ターザスのフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の代表者の捜査手順への共同参加に対する同意を要求した」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “合作请求已审核，请求已接受。我请求塔祖斯兄弟同意冯·瓦兰修斯王朝代表共同参加调查程序。”
languages.original_text: "Request for cooperation reviewed and accepted. I request Tech-Brother Tarzus's consent to the co-participation of representatives of the von Valancius dynasty in the investigation proceedings."

traits.locale_text: “合作请求已审核，请求已接受。我请求塔祖斯兄弟同意冯·瓦兰修斯王朝代表共同参加调查程序。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Anfrage zur Kooperation geprüft und akzeptiert. Ich bitte um die Zustimmung von Tech-Bruder Tarzus, dass Vertreter der Dynastie von Valancius an der Untersuchung teilnehmen dürfen."
languages.original_text: "Request for cooperation reviewed and accepted. I request Tech-Brother Tarzus's consent to the co-participation of representatives of the von Valancius dynasty in the investigation proceedings."

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage zur Kooperation geprüft und akzeptiert. Ich bitte um die Zustimmung von Tech-Bruder Tarzus, dass Vertreter der Dynastie von Valancius an der Untersuchung teilnehmen dürfen."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Demande de coopération examinée et acceptée. Sollicitons le consentement du technofrère Tarzus à l'intégration des représentants de la dynastie von Valancius dans le processus d'enquête. »
languages.original_text: "Request for cooperation reviewed and accepted. I request Tech-Brother Tarzus's consent to the co-participation of representatives of the von Valancius dynasty in the investigation proceedings."

traits.locale_text: « Demande de coopération examinée et acceptée. Sollicitons le consentement du technofrère Tarzus à l'intégration des représentants de la dynastie von Valancius dans le processus d'enquête. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «Solicitud de cooperación revisada y aceptada. Solicito que el tecnohermano Tarzus consienta la colaboración de representantes de la dinastía von Valancius durante el transcurso de la investigación».
languages.original_text: "Request for cooperation reviewed and accepted. I request Tech-Brother Tarzus's consent to the co-participation of representatives of the von Valancius dynasty in the investigation proceedings."

traits.locale_text: «Solicitud de cooperación revisada y aceptada. Solicito que el tecnohermano Tarzus consienta la colaboración de representantes de la dinastía von Valancius durante el transcurso de la investigación».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "İş birliği talebi incelenip kabul edildi. Von Valancius Hanedanlığı'nın temsilcilerinin inceleme sürecinde rol alması konusunda Tekno Kardeş Tarzus'un da onayını talep etmekteyim."
languages.original_text: "Request for cooperation reviewed and accepted. I request Tech-Brother Tarzus's consent to the co-participation of representatives of the von Valancius dynasty in the investigation proceedings."

traits.locale_text: "İş birliği talebi incelendi ve kabul edildi. Von Valancius Hanedanlığı'nın temsilcilerinin inceleme sürecinde rol alması konusunda Tekno Kardeş Tarzus'un da onayını talep etmekteyim."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
